If Bahati scored 20 more points than Azibo, then Bahati scored x + 20 points.
If Dinar scored 10 points less than Bahati, then Dinar scored (x + 20) - 10 = x + 10 points.

Subtracting 30 from both sides, we get 3x = 15.

Subtracting 4 from both sides, we get r + w = 8 pints.
